text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump The graphs is #COVID19 deaths per million of country population.
Linear scale.
The #USA has fewer deaths per million than #Italy 
But Italy has turned the curve ( for now ).
Neither the USA nor the #UK are clear of peak #coronavirus 
It is awaiting game. https://t.co/RtSilii4uz

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
